issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I'm using 7.0.1, trying to switch to 7.0.2 RC I unable to run it to android and I get this error

error: incompatible types: Class<KrollExternalModule> cannot be converted to Class<? extends KrollSourceCodeProvider>
[ERROR] :  						(Class<KrollExternalModule>) Class.forName(className));
[ERROR] :  						^
[ERROR] :  Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
[ERROR] :  Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
[ERROR] :  Note: Some messages have been simplified; recompile with -Xdiags:verbose to get full output
[ERROR] :  1 error
[ERROR] Application Installer abnormal process termination. Process exit value was 1

comments.body: Hello, Can you run through the terminal and get the trace log "appc run -p android -l trace"? Send the log in here. Thanks.

[~otto.pic] You need to execute that command inside your Titanium project folder

Could you also provide the full log of the error you are receiving when running your app?
[~gmathews], can you please provide a backport.
Backport is already provided, I changed the PR to {{7_1_X}}

Verified the fix in SDK 7.2.0.v20180301081409 & 7.1.0.v20180228160738.

Closing.
